statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT energy_reading, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_reading > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(energy_reading) AS avg_energy FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(energy_reading) > 50;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_reading BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, energy_consumption FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, energy_consumption FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE total_cost > 100 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, energy_consumption, location FROM sensors WHERE energy_consumption > 50 AND location LIKE '%Floor%' ORDER BY location, energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT billing_id, billing_date, total_cost FROM BillingInfo WHERE total_cost < 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT Sensors.sensor_type, EnergyConsumptionData.energy_consumed FROM Sensors JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON Sensors.sensor_id = EnergyConsumptionData.sensor_id WHERE Sensors.sensor_location = 'Room A' ORDER BY EnergyConsumptionData.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT BillingInfo.billing_date, SUM(BillingInfo.total_cost) AS total_billing FROM BillingInfo JOIN Sensors ON BillingInfo.sensor_id = Sensors.sensor_id WHERE Sensors.sensor_type = 'Thermostat' GROUP BY BillingInfo.billing_date ORDER BY BillingInfo.billing_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData;

SELECT Sensors.sensor_location, COUNT(*) AS total_energy_readings FROM Sensors JOIN EnergyConsumptionData ON Sensors.sensor_id = EnergyConsumptionData.sensor_id GROUP BY Sensors.sensor_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_energy_readings DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BillingHistory;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature Sensor';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_consumed, datetime FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_consumed, DATE(datetime) AS date FROM energy_consumption WHERE date='2022-10-20';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 AND datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT billing_records.datetime, billing_records.cost, billing_records.currency, sensors.location FROM billing_records JOIN sensors ON billing_records.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE sensors.location = 'Building A';
